Name: Teaquila
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: A Mexican iced tea sweetened with honey.
History: Created in 2011 by Mark Cooke and the rest of the team at North Bar, Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Teaquila contains 184 calories
